summary: Look out Below!!! I guess I’ll upload this here, even though links no longer work and it’s fairly likely I’ll get got by the...
caption:
Look out Below!!!

I guess I’ll upload this here, even though links no longer work and it’s fairly likely I’ll get got by the bot. The lack of All Might/Toshinori content here is starting to become alarming.

I’ll try to continue to upload art here for a while, but if I start to notice other sites are getting more attention than Tumblr as I feared/predicted, then I’ll likely fade away here.

Since I can’t make posts with links anymore, please be sure to check out my page and its links for ko-fi/commission information!

Marvel: hollantom

Books: wylansper

title: Wingman Kirishima - Part 1
body:
anime: boku no hero academia

pairing: bakugou/midoriya 

part 2 will come in the near future hopefully

Bakugou felt a squeeze against his shoulders. He quickly moved away. 

“Don’t touch me!” he snarled. 

Kirshima put his hands up innocently. “Just trying to calm you down, bro.” 

Bakugou took a deep breath. It wasn’t everyday he planned to confess to his crush. To Deku, of all people. 

“Just be honest!” said Kirishima, encouragingly. “Ah, go get him!” he yelled as Bakugou walked over to Midoriya, who sat on the couch with a phone in his hands. Hearing footsteps, he looked up to his fellow third year and now friend, setting his phone on the couch. 

His eyes sparkled. “Kacchan! What’s up?”

Bakugou stood there for a split second. “Deku,” he tried to say forcibly, but it had a weak finish. 

“What’s up?” he asked again, but sounding more worried. “Is something wrong?”  

Bakugou stared at him for a long second, mouth moving slightly as if he wants to say something but can’t think of how. He looked over to Kirishima, who gave him a thumbs up for encouragement. However, it fell flat. He had already given up. 

“Fuck you,” he settled. Then walked away. 

Kirishima face-palmed while Midoriya wore a look mixed with shock and confusion. 

“Oh, fuck it,” mumbled Kirishima as he moved from his spot around the corner to sit next next to Midoriya, who was still in a slight daze. 

“’Sup, Midoriya!” he said while wrapping an arm around his shoulders and giving him a light pat.

Midoriya snapped out of it. “Oh, Kirishima!” he smiled, then paused. “Wait, you’re his best friend,” he mumbled, “Do you happen to know if anything’s going on with Kacchan?” 

Kirishima chuckled. “Honestly? It has to do with you.” 

“What?? With me? Did I say, or, or do something? Crap, I should apologize-”

“Woah, woah,” interrupted Kirishima, “I’m going to stop you right there. It’s not that you did anything wrong.” 

“Then what?” asked Midoriya. 

Kirishima sighed. He already knew this, but wanted to hear him say it. “Do you… do you like him, Midoriya?” 

“Of course I do.” 

“No, no, not like that,” Kirishima shook his head. “I mean, like like him. Like, wanna date him and all that.”

“I-what?” he blushed. “I-I mean,” he looked down, “maybe? yes? Why are asking?” 

Kirishima smiled. “I think you should tell him.” 

Midoriya stared blankly at his friend. 

“Don’t look at me like that!” yelled Kirishima. “Really! I think you should!” 

“He’ll kill me!”

“He won’t!” 

“How do you know that??” 

“Because-! Because… I just know.” 

“So when you said it had something to do with me, you don’t mean he might… feel the same?” asked Midoriya. 

Kirishima sighed. He’ll probably get yelled at for this, but there’s no way Bakugou can do it on his own. He’s tried, and failed, too many times. The redhead nodded to confirm Midoriya’s theory. 

Midoryia widened his eyes. “That can’t- there’s no way.” 

“Honestly, Midoriya, are you really that surprised?” 

“Yes!” he answered quickly. 

Kirishima laughed. “Well, I guess he is pretty shit with his feelings.” 

A thought had just occurred to Midoriya. “Wait, so just now. Was he?” he couldn’t finish. 

Kirishima knew what he was about to ask. He nodded. “He was trying to confess, again.”

“Oh…” 

“That’s why, if you’re serious about him, I think you should be the one.” 

Midoriya nodded. “Thank you,” he said  before getting off the couch. “I owe you!” 

Kirishima shook his head. “You don’t owe me anything. Just keep him happy!” 

“Yeah!” exclaimed Midoriya as he headed to Bakugous floor. 

Kirishima smiled. It’ll be rough, the confession that is. But they’ll find a way.

blog.name: bnhahc
blog.title: BNHA Headcannons
blog.description:
Hi, I'm Jude (or Coret, if you wanna use my pen name)!
I own this weirdness! If you would like to submit your own headcanons to me, go ahead! I'm always accepting asks, and I love getting them!!

summary: Okay time for some Tododorki!! (And don't feel bad for misspelling it, anon! I didn't even realize until I read the second ask...
body:
Okay time for some Tododorki!! (And don’t feel bad for misspelling it, anon! I didn’t even realize until I read the second ask T-T)

Todoroki Shouto

*When Todoroki was little, he knew Momo and Iida from social meetings, but never knew their names. Never hung out with them either, but rather watched the two of them talk with each other.

*Todoroki never really had friends growing up, and spent most of his time during school reading or taking naps.

*Ever since his mom went away, Todoroki has always had really bad nightmares. He never found a good way to deal with them, and he only ever told Fuyumi (his sister) about them.

*One time, the Todoroki siblings were arguing. About what, he can’t remember, all he can recall is that he said to them “At least I came out right,”. He broke down sobbing and profusely apologizing. That’s when he realized he was brainwashed.

*Todoroki knows that he’s the “perfect product” of a quirk marriage. Whenever he sees a picture of his parents together, he wants to burn it. It makes him sick.

*When Todoroki first started out at UA, he immediately thought that Bakugou’s and Midoriya were crazy due to both of their behaviors on that first day. He told himself not to get close to them.

*Todoroki will sometimes a lot of times catch people looking at him. He doesn’t necessarily hate it, but he doesn’t like it. He honestly isn’t sure if he wants a relationship or not, because he knows for a fact that Endeavor will try to set up an arrangement for him…

*Despite what he lets off, Todoroki has a hilarious sense of humor, and the perfect off hand comments to get anyone laughing. He once made Bakugou snort.

*Todoroki’s mental state is definitely one to worry about. Fuyumi has tried getting him into therapy multiple times, but he’s never gone. He doesn’t think he needs it, and believes he needs to be strong and tough it out.

*When Todoroki started becoming friends with Midoriya and Crew™, he thought to himself “Well, that failed”. Although, he doesn’t mind. He actually lives having friends, despite not knowing how to friend sometimes.

*Todoroki loses his shit if anyone attacks his friends while their not training. There’s no reason to, is his logic. One time, these girls from general studies cornered Momo and started to bash on her, calling her “slut” or whatever name you could think of. Todoroki almost got expelled that day. No one actually knows what happened.

Also, I am going to call Todo Tododorki in your honor, Anon!!!

Also, I am going to call Todo Tododorki in your honor, Anon!!!

trail.content_raw:
Okay time for some Tododorki!! (And don’t feel bad for misspelling it, anon! I didn’t even realize until I read the second ask T-T)

Todoroki Shouto

*When Todoroki was little, he knew Momo and Iida from social meetings, but never knew their names. Never hung out with them either, but rather watched the two of them talk with each other.

*Todoroki never really had friends growing up, and spent most of his time during school reading or taking naps.

*Ever since his mom went away, Todoroki has always had really bad nightmares. He never found a good way to deal with them, and he only ever told Fuyumi (his sister) about them.

*One time, the Todoroki siblings were arguing. About what, he can’t remember, all he can recall is that he said to them “At least I came out right,”. He broke down sobbing and profusely apologizing. That’s when he realized he was brainwashed.

*Todoroki knows that he’s the “perfect product” of a quirk marriage. Whenever he sees a picture of his parents together, he wants to burn it. It makes him sick.

*When Todoroki first started out at UA, he immediately thought that Bakugou’s and Midoriya were crazy due to both of their behaviors on that first day. He told himself not to get close to them.

*Todoroki will sometimes a lot of times catch people looking at him. He doesn’t necessarily hate it, but he doesn’t like it. He honestly isn’t sure if he wants a relationship or not, because he knows for a fact that Endeavor will try to set up an arrangement for him…

*Despite what he lets off, Todoroki has a hilarious sense of humor, and the perfect off hand comments to get anyone laughing. He once made Bakugou snort.

*Todoroki’s mental state is definitely one to worry about. Fuyumi has tried getting him into therapy multiple times, but he’s never gone. He doesn’t think he needs it, and believes he needs to be strong and tough it out.

*When Todoroki started becoming friends with Midoriya and Crew™, he thought to himself “Well, that failed”. Although, he doesn’t mind. He actually lives having friends, despite not knowing how to friend sometimes.

*Todoroki loses his shit if anyone attacks his friends while their not training. There’s no reason to, is his logic. One time, these girls from general studies cornered Momo and started to bash on her, calling her “slut” or whatever name you could think of. Todoroki almost got expelled that day. No one actually knows what happened.

Also, I am going to call Todo Tododorki in your honor, Anon!!!
trail.content:
Okay time for some Tododorki!! (And don’t feel bad for misspelling it, anon! I didn’t even realize until I read the second ask T-T)

*Todoroki never really had friends growing up, and spent most of his time during school reading or taking naps.

*Ever since his mom went away, Todoroki has always had really bad nightmares. He never found a good way to deal with them, and he only ever told Fuyumi (his sister) about them.

*One time, the Todoroki siblings were arguing. About what, he can’t remember, all he can recall is that he said to them “At least I came out right,”. He broke down sobbing and profusely apologizing. That’s when he realized he was brainwashed.

*Todoroki knows that he’s the “perfect product” of a quirk marriage. Whenever he sees a picture of his parents together, he wants to burn it. It makes him sick.

*When Todoroki first started out at UA, he immediately thought that Bakugou’s and Midoriya were crazy due to both of their behaviors on that first day. He told himself not to get close to them.

*Todoroki will sometimes a lot of times catch people looking at him. He doesn’t necessarily hate it, but he doesn’t like it. He honestly isn’t sure if he wants a relationship or not, because he knows for a fact that Endeavor will try to set up an arrangement for him…

*Despite what he lets off, Todoroki has a hilarious sense of humor, and the perfect off hand comments to get anyone laughing. He once made Bakugou snort.

*Todoroki’s mental state is definitely one to worry about. Fuyumi has tried getting him into therapy multiple times, but he’s never gone. He doesn’t think he needs it, and believes he needs to be strong and tough it out.

*When Todoroki started becoming friends with Midoriya and Crew™, he thought to himself “Well, that failed”. Although, he doesn’t mind. He actually lives having friends, despite not knowing how to friend sometimes.

summary: Have u watched the two heroes yet? If so where?

summary: I've taken notice, that people like to create OC's.  Imaginary characters, created by them, who have their own personalities,...
body:
MY OC.

I’ve taken notice, that people like to create OC’s. Imaginary characters, created by them, who have their own personalities, and powers. So, I decided to do one myself. It’s not very original, but I think it’s acceptable, to say the least.

Name: Toraley Akane.

Age: 18 years old.

Occupation: third year student at UA.

Quirk: this is the best part, because this is where people like to let their imaginations run free, and come up with the most bizarre, overpowered quirks. So I went for something a lot simpler. Her quirk is Tigrese form. Exactly. Simmilar to Tsuyu, she can do everything a Tiger can. Which means, she has the strength of 10 men, she can run at a speed of 90 km per hour, she is extremely agile, and the most important thing, her five senses,are extremely acute, especially, her sight and night vision, and her hearing.

Appearance: Well, this is how she would look like:

I know, she doesn’t look very tiger-like. But that’s part of her quirk. Instead of directly looking like a tiger, she can turn into a tiger. She has a half-transformation, where she is still human, but she can grow feline ears, a tail, powerful fangs, strong enough to break bones, and feline paws. And she can still think like a human under this form. And there is her final transformation, where she can change her human shape totally into a tigrese. And under this form, she loses all hints of human rationality, and is highly controled by her wild, animal instincts. Needless to say, that under that form she is totally capable of consuming human flesh.

Well, this is it. I know it’s not anything from the other world, it’s quite simple actually. What inspired me to create her, was my utter dissapointment with the Pussycat’s quirks. Yes, they dress like felines, but their quirks are not related to cats at all. So I decided to make my own, real cat-girl. I also headcanon her to be the fourth strongest student in the academy, below the big 3. And I also imagine she would be friends with Hado. I think Nejire would pester her with questions about her quirk, and Tiger/feline like behaviour. Also I might update this, and add more info to this post.
